title: Enchanting Emerald & Diamond Necklace - A Royal Telugu Haaram
materials: featuring meticulously set Emeralds (62.97ct) and brilliant-cut Diamonds (3.03ct). Each diamond is carefully selected for its exceptional clarity and fire. Hyderabadi Polish ensures a lasting shine.
features: This contemporary Haaram design blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern sensibility. The necklace showcases a graduated arrangement of rectangular emeralds, each framed by clusters of sparkling diamonds. This piece has an open setting for maximum light to illuminate each stone.
colors: Lush green emeralds contrasted by the dazzling brilliance of white diamonds set in lustrous white gold. This classic combination exudes sophistication and elegance.
occasions: half-saree function. A statement piece for any modern or traditional formal event.
description: This necklace seamlessly blends traditional Haaram grandeur with modern design sensibilities. The exquisite craftsmanship, coupled with the exceptional quality of the emeralds and diamonds, makes this a timeless investment. It showcases the rich cultural heritage of South Indian jewelry with a contemporary flair. A true heirloom piece.
